src:
Bukan MU, Ini Klub yang Akan Dituju Mario Mandzukic
04 Nov 2019, 19:10 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Penyerang Juventus, Mario Mandzukic diberitakan tidak jadi pindah ke Manchester United. Ia diberitakan memilih untuk pindah ke klub lain di bulan Januari nanti.
Mandzukic sendiri diyakini sudah mantap pindah dari Juventus. Ia memutuskan hengkang setelah ia tidak lagi terlibat di skuat Si Nyonya Tua sejak kedatangan Maurizio Sarri.
Striker 34 tahun itu diberitakan akan melanjutkan karirnya di Inggris. Ia diyakini bakal bergabung dengan salah satu tim besar Inggris, Manchester United.
Namun Calciomercato mengklaim bahwa Mandzukic mengubah pikirannya. Ia diberitakan tidak jadi bergabung dengan United.

Lantas klub mana yang bakal dibela oleh Mandzukic? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Not MU, this is the club that Mario Mandzukic will be heading to
Nov 04 2019, 19:10 by Bola.net
Soccer - Juventus striker Mario Mandzukic is reported not to have moved to Manchester United. He reportedly chose to move to another club in January.
Mandzukic himself is believed to have settled on moving from Juventus. He decided to leave after he was no longer involved in the Old Lady's squad since Maurizio Sarri's arrival.
The 34-year-old striker is reported to be continuing his career in England. He is believed to be joining one of the great English teams, Manchester United.
But Calciomercato claims that Mandzukic changed his mind. He reportedly did not join United.

So which club will Mandzukic defend? Check out the information below.
